reviewtext: I bought this 128mg card at Costco and I like it for the most part but when played in my mp3 player, I have some problems with the music flickering on and off once in a while which does not occur with my 64 and 32 meg card. But it really doesn't bother me since I only paid 59.99 at Costco. Its a great deal considering this little piece of memory has like 2000 times more RAM than Apple II's from the 80's!
